parameters.name: locales
parameters.description: A string with a BCP 47 language tag or an Intl.Locale instance, or an array of such locale identifiers. For the general form and interpretation of the locales argument, see the parameter description on the Intl main page.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description:
An object containing the following properties, in the order they are retrieved (all of them are optional):

localeMatcher

The locale matching algorithm to use. Possible values are "lookup" and "best fit"; the default is "best fit". For information about this option, see Locale identification and negotiation.

type

Indicates the type of grouping. Possible values are:

"conjunction" (default)

For "and"-based grouping of the list items: "A, B, and C"

"disjunction"

For "or"-based grouping of the list items: "A, B, or C"

"unit"

For grouping the list items as a unit (neither "and"-based nor "or"-based): "A, B, C"



style

The grouping style (for example, whether list separators and conjunctions are included). Possible values are:

"long" (default)

E.g. "A, B, and C"

"short"

E.g. "A, B, C"

"narrow"

E.g. "A B C"

parameters.name: localeMatcher
parameters.description: The locale matching algorithm to use. Possible values are "lookup" and "best fit"; the default is "best fit". For information about this option, see Locale identification and negotiation.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Indicates the type of grouping. Possible values are:

"conjunction" (default)

For "and"-based grouping of the list items: "A, B, and C"

"disjunction"

For "or"-based grouping of the list items: "A, B, or C"

"unit"

For grouping the list items as a unit (neither "and"-based nor "or"-based): "A, B, C"

parameters.name: "conjunction"
parameters.description: For "and"-based grouping of the list items: "A, B, and C"

parameters.name: "disjunction"
parameters.description: For "or"-based grouping of the list items: "A, B, or C"

parameters.name: "unit"
parameters.description: For grouping the list items as a unit (neither "and"-based nor "or"-based): "A, B, C"

parameters.name: style
parameters.description:
The grouping style (for example, whether list separators and conjunctions are included). Possible values are:

"long" (default)

E.g. "A, B, and C"

"short"

E.g. "A, B, C"

"narrow"

E.g. "A B C"

parameters.name: "long"
parameters.description: E.g. "A, B, and C"

parameters.name: "short"
parameters.description: E.g. "A, B, C"

parameters.name: "narrow"
parameters.description: E.g. "A B C"

parameters.name: RangeError
parameters.description: Thrown if locales or options contain invalid values.

name: Intl.ListFormat.supportedLocalesOf()
description: Returns an array containing those of the provided locales that are supported without having to fall back to the runtime's default locale.
return_value: An array of strings representing a subset of the given locale tags that are supported in list formatting without having to fall back to the runtime's default locale.

parameters.name: locales
parameters.description: A string with a BCP 47 language tag, or an array of such strings. For the general form and interpretation of the locales argument, see the parameter description on the Intl main page.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description:
An object that may have the following property:

localeMatcher

The locale matching algorithm to use. Possible values are "lookup" and "best fit"; the default is "best fit". For information about this option, see the Intl page.

parameters.name: localeMatcher
parameters.description: The locale matching algorithm to use. Possible values are "lookup" and "best fit"; the default is "best fit". For information about this option, see the Intl page.

name: Intl.ListFormat.prototype.constructor
description: The constructor function that created the instance object. For Intl.ListFormat instances, the initial value is the Intl.ListFormat constructor.

name: Intl.ListFormat.prototype[@@toStringTag]
description: The initial value of the @@toStringTag property is the string "Intl.ListFormat". This property is used in Object.prototype.toString().

name: Intl.ListFormat.prototype.format()
description: Returns a language-specific formatted string representing the elements of the list.
return_value: A language-specific formatted string representing the elements of the list

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: An iterable object, such as an Array.

name: Intl.ListFormat.prototype.formatToParts()
description: Returns an array of objects representing the different components that can be used to format a list of values in a locale-aware fashion.
return_value: An Array of components which contains the formatted parts from the list.

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: An iterable object, such as an Array, to be formatted according to a locale.

name: Intl.ListFormat.prototype.resolvedOptions()
description: Returns a new object with properties reflecting the locale and style formatting options computed during the construction of the current Intl.ListFormat object.
return_value:
An object with properties reflecting the locale and formatting options computed during
  the construction of the given Intl.ListFormat object.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description:
The BCP 47 language tag for the locale actually used. If any Unicode extension
      values were requested in the input BCP 47 language tag that led to this locale,
      the key-value pairs that were requested and are supported for this locale are
      included in locale.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description:
The value provided for this property in the options argument of the
      constructor or the default value ("long"). Its value is either
      "long", "short", or "narrow".

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The value provided for this property in the options argument of the
      constructor or the default value ("conjunction"). Its value is either
      "conjunction", "disjunction", or "unit".
